channel.title: Help me chage what the npcs say
channel.description: help me chage what the npcs say please and how do u chage the name of the scape when you log in it says ..

item.title: Help me chage what the npcs say
item.dc:creator: @bughy bughy
item.description:
@bughy wrote:

um all the texts are in NPChandler

if an npc of urs say “welcome to XDDSXScape” and u want to change it, press ctrl f and search for it and change it to watever u like eg “welcome to XXXScape”

Read full topic
item.source: Help me chage what the npcs say
